text: Dave Lamb (born 17 January 1969), instead of David Alexander Lamb or David Lamb, is an English comedian, television presenter and voice actor. He is best known for presenting Come Dine with Me, Goodness Gracious Me and Horrible Histories: Gory Games. == Other websites == * Category:1969 births Category:English voice actors Category:English comedians Category:English television presenters Category:People from Westminster Category:Actors from London Category:Living people
title: Dave Lamb
